name: 50-Mon
description:
This Pokemon clone does not have guns. It does not have creatures forced into labor camps. It does not have creatures that devour other creatures right before your eyes. Hell, it doesn't even have any variety in attacks for the creatures that are in the game. For a Pokemon clone like that, might I suggest PalWorld*?

If you're okay with those shortcomings, then enjoy 50-Mon. Made in LOVE2D while following Harvard's cs50 lecture series on Youtube.

*I am in no way affiliated with the developers or publishers of PalWorld. I simply find the game fascinating.
